::FZ/Zardus::

The unprotected mental area of FZ's instincts was calmed by Halucigen's attempts, enough to make FZ relax, but the Iron Fist begins to send signals for him to return to normal operation, atempting to wake him up again.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus swears silently, the Iron Fist reporting on what was happening to FZ's mind. He wasn't sure exactly what it was, but it wasn't welcome at all. He looks back at Orchestra, sending a few mental commands to the Iron Fist.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Outside, several autoguns begin to lift with a mechanical sound of sliding, aiming themselves at Halucigen.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers@t... wrote:
> Halucigen smirked as thier gaze finally met, then it turned to a 
> frown.  Complete machine, it had no nightmares or dreams to cloak 
> it in, while he found out secrets in the mind.  Halucigen decided on 
> a course of action.  Quickly, he tried to put FZ in a dream state, of 
> normal, nothing was happening to him and he would simply jsut 
> stand there thinking that...hopefully.
